Question: Every time hunger strikes, eating eventually follows.
It's never the case that rain and sunshine occur at the same time.
Whenever the engine starts, acceleration kicks in three steps later.
I am a student must hold everywhere until from some point on, I am graduated holds infinitely often.
Whenever an exam is scheduled, studying occurs beforehand.
If it's nighttime, then sleeping occurs.
Both the sun is shining and the birds are chirping in every time step.
The sun shines always, and whenever the birds sing, the cats don't meow.
If it is the case that every emission test is eventually passed, then good air quality needs to holds infinitely often.
Formula: G(emission_test -> F passed) -> G F good_air_quality

Question: If Mark loves Stacy infinitely often, then Stacey loves Mark holds infinitely often as well.
Formula: G F mark_loves_stacey -> G F stacey_loves_mark

Question: Either the store is open all day or the online website is accessible around the clock.
Formula: G F store_open || G F online_website_accessible

Question: From some point in time on I am always not childless.
Whenever there is no peace and no prosperity, conflict arises eventually.
Happiness and sadness never coincide, but one of them is experienced at every moment in life.
Whenever the ingredients sugar and flour are equal in quantity, the resulting cake's taste and texture are equally good.
A meeting can only be scheduled if a room reservation has been made beforehand.
After the shipment is delivered, a return request won't be processed again.
After the valve is opened, water flows freely.
Music practice and anyone sleeping won't happen simultaneously.
Whenever the oven preheats and the timer beeps for the next step, then the aroma of freshly baked cookies fills the kitchen one step after the timer beeps.
Formula: G (oven_preheats & X timer_beeps -> X X aroma)

Question: Whenever the seeds are planted, the flowers bloom eventually from the next step onward.
We work every fifth day.
Formula: G (work -> X !work & X X !work & X X X !work & X X X X !work & X X X X X work)

Question: Either failed my exam holds infinitely often or passed the exam holds in the next step.
Sam is taller than Ben will hold at all instances.
Whenever the food is hot, the food is cold in the next two steps.
At all times, one of the following apps will be running: messaging, navigation, or music.
If the alarm rings, someone will eventually wake up.
The temperature must always be within a normal range, but if it exceeds that range, it allows for two time intervals to return to normal.
Not a day goes by where the sky is clear for more than two hours.
Formula: G !(clear_sky & X clear_sky & X X clear_sky)

Question: The sprinklers can only activate every three hours to conserve water.
Formula: G (sprinklers_activate -> (X !sprinklers_activate & X X !sprinklers_activate & X X X !sprinklers_activate))

Question: Every sunrise is followed by the chirping of birds.
Eventually, you drink water while the sun shines.
Both the waves crashing and the seagulls flying occur eventually.
It's always the case that the current temperature is equal to tomorrow's temperature.
If it's sunny then, in the next step, thunder holds until it rains or always thunder holds.
Formula: G (sunny -> X (thunder U rain | G thunder))

Question: The party is on until the speaker is broken or always the party is on.
